Key:
This is all so normal. It's not any different than
ordinary life...

At the very least, I'm not wondering which gal
game I'm in...

The initial setting was arranged to be no
different from your usual everyday routine,
Shido Itsuka.

So this is still like the initial setting of the
game. Why do I have mixed feelings about it?

Kotori mentioned before that it was originally
similar to my normal life... But that's not even
true.

The initial setting was a gal game type of world.
If it was no different from your ordinary life,
that means your daily life is like a gal game.
You say it so matter-of-factly!

"(Even hearing Arusu say the words "gal game" in
such a serious expression is weird, too.)"

Well, even yesterday, it wasn't that weird,
was it?
Although the daydream event was unusual...

Yes. That was truly intriguing. If I want to
discover what love is, I decided that I need to
factor in more of your surroundings.
What do you mean by that?

I've changed a few settings based on the
information I gathered yesterday. It should be an
environment in which love can more easily grow.
I have nothing but bad feelings about this...

Oh, I have to go to class. Well... I guess I'll
know after going.
Good morning...?!

Y-You're late, Shido...san. Please... be sure to
not be late.
Yoshino? Uh... What are you doing?
Hey, Shido! Morning! Yoshino is a teacher!
T-Teacher...?

Yes. U-Um... As of today, it seems... that I am
the homeroom teacher... for this class.
Whaaaaaat?!

Yeah. Despite being so little, she's a teacher.
Yoshino is smart. Good job!
Th-Thank... you...
Yahoo! A female teacher! The sweet, forbidden\nextra-curricular lessons! How exciting! Isn't\nyour heart pounding just thinking about it?!

No... Honestly, looking at Yoshino... it's hard to
consider her as a teacher.

I-I knew it... It's weird, isn't it...? But the
school told me... as of today, I'll be a
teacher...
What's... going on...
Oh, it's easy, Shido-san.
Kurumi...? What are you doing here at school?

I am a transfer student. It's not my first time,
so I'm not too surprised.
And what's the reasoning behind that?

Of course, our roles have changed.
Right, Arusu-san?

Yes, exactly. In order to proceed the growth of
love in Shido Itsuka's environment, I changed
the romanceable targets' settings.

Is this what you were talking about earlier? Then,
that means the others—

I'm here! Darling, we'll always be able to be
together!
M-Miku...? You're a transfer student, too?

Rather than a transfer student, I'm more like an
exchange student, no...?
Exchange student... as in international?

No～! I mean that Rindouji All-Girls School and
Raizen High School exchanges students～ But I'm
in a separate classroom from you. So bummed!
Uh, Miku... you're a year older than me anyways...
Who cares about the small details, gosh!
M-Miku-tan...? What is... going on, Itsuka...?!

Uh... I guess she's not transferring, but
something similar to it?
Did you hear the missus? She called him "darling"...

"Yes, ma'am, I did. Who says "darling" these days?
So lame. I guess that's Itsuka-san's new woman."
That's so lame.

Could you guys shut up?! Argh... Well... good
thing she's in a different class...

Awww. I wanted to be in your class, darling! I'm
in the same class as Kaguya-san and Yuzuru-san.

Oh, is that so... At least you know someone...
Wait, so they're your classmates?
Seems like it～ I'm looking forward to it!
But...

So, I guess I skipped grades and I am now in high
school, Onii-chan!
Kotori... Not you, too.

Yeah. When I went to school, they told me I'd be
skipping and shipping off!
You don't seem to be bothered by it too much.

Yeah, I mean, if you're going to get a heroine
that's younger, forcing them into the same school
is pretty common in a gal game.
That may be true, but...

But it was pretty annoying that I went all the way
to school before knowing. Arusu, why didn’t you
tell me? I would've gone with you guys earlier...
I wasn't aware of the specific setting changes.

I'm sorry for putting you through
the extra trouble.

Well, it's not a big deal. So you're trying to
gather all of Shido's targets, but you don't
seem to know the specifics, huh...
Yes, exactly.

Then that means the in-game system is kind of
autonomous and moving on its own. All right,
that's pretty good information to have.

E-Everyone! Class is about to s-start! Miku-san,
Kotori-san, please return to your classrooms～

Awww, I wanted to be in the same class as
Onii-chan! Onii-chan, live strong!
Okay...
All right, Onii-chan, later!
I-I will now be... taking roll call!
...Yoshino seems to be pumped.

(Maybe she's happy playing the teacher role. She's
working so hard. It's kinda adorable.)

Oh, morning, Origami. It's been such a commotion
this morning.

The class environment has changed drastically.
It's a possibility that some dangers may arise, so
Shido, you should stay by my side more than usual.

Hm? I mean, you've always been sitting next to me,
so we're pretty close as it is.

You should be even closer. To be specific, we
should be close to the point where our shoulders
touch. Or rather, you should sit on my lap.

No, no, no! Especially that last part!
It's so weird!

Then I can shift my plans slightly to sit on your
lap instead. That's not so bad.

Wait a minute! Why are you putting your hands up
your skirt?! What are you trying to take off?!

I mean, there could be an accident... So I was
going to prepare for that. It's no problem.

There is a big problem with that! Okay... I'll put
my desk a little closer, so please just accept
that...

Understood. But I will let them know that I was
forced into a significant compromise.
You're way too intense...

Hm? Hey, Shido! Why are you so close to Origami
Tobiichi? That's not fair, Origami Tobiichi!
I want to be close to him, too!

That is not possible. If both of Shido's sides are
taken, there will be no escape route for him
should danger arise.

What... Then you should stay away from
him as well!
H-Hey... I'm going to take roll call...!
Yoshino, hang in there! Be a teacher and don't be\nafraid to come down hard on them!
O-Okay!

E-Everyone, please sit down and
listen to your teacher!

*Sigh*... I feel like today is going to be even
more tiring than yesterday...
(We're in class right now, but...)
...Grr.

(In the end, both Origami and Tohka were
instructed to not be near me.)

(However, they're glaring at each other from
opposite sides of me. It's really unnerving...)
...Heh.
Whoa, what the—?! I felt a chill go down my back.

So not only those two, but you won't even be with
me?

Kurumi, not you too... Cut it out, we're in class.
And besides, what are you going to do if they
cause a commotion again?

It'll be fine. It appears that both Tohka-san and
Origami-san are busy glaring at one another...
So you can give me some attention.
Who's the one that sat Kurumi behind me...

(She's reaching over to me, and I can feel her
breath on my skin. She smells good too, so it's
distracting...)

I don't know about that, but... I know I love my
seat, I get to see you and do things like this—

Ahh?! H-Hey, stop running your finger down my
spine!

Hehe... It seems this is the perfect spot for me
to tease you. But Shido-san, I didn't know you
were weak against these things. I feel tempted...

(Ahh! Kurumi's moving her fingers from my spine to
under my arms... It tickles... This isn't good.)

You seem to have muscles, too. I'm not used to
touching a man, so it's extremely intriguing.

You sure seem to be used to it! Hey... Where are
you touching...?

Shh... if you make a fuss, people around you are
going to notice.

Be quiet... And let me make this fun for you.
So... do you like this...?
O-Ohhh...
Kurumi Tokisaki. What are you doing?

I'm having some fun with Shido-san. Shido-san's
body is surprisingly nice.

Shido's body fat is normally 7%, but this week he
has been eating more, so touching him under these
conditions has been more comforting lately.
Why do you know such things?
Kurumi Tokisaki. Put that finger away.

My, you sure look intimidating. But I refuse.
See, look... I can even touch places like here.
Agh?!
I take your actions as a declaration of battle.
That is definitely the wrong conclusion!

What are you doing?! I have been trying my hardest
to refrain from such things!

Well, what are you raising your voice during class
for?!

S-Skinship with a few people during c-class... You
seriously are an embarrassment, Itsuka-kun.

Just because we're in English class doesn't give
you an excuse to go from A to B all the way down
the alphabet! Gosh, I can see right through you.
That's so lame.

That's not something I'd ever think, much less
say! God, help me!

(In the end, I was the one making the most noise
and was the only one who got in trouble.)
(Not fair...!)
F-Finally, it's lunch time... I-I'm tired.

(I finally get to take a break...
Of course not...)
Darling! Your beloved Miku has come to visit you!

I hope Itsuka stubs his toe on a drawer edge.
I hope Itsuka stubs his toe on a drawer edge.
I hope Itsuka stubs his toe on a drawer edge!
Tonomachi, you're scaring me!

Shido-san? You sure seem tired. If you'd like, I
can give you a massage... I promise to show you an
even better time than earlier.
If you do any more, it's not going to end well!

U-Um, Shido-san... I don't know anyone in the
teacher's lounge... May I... sit with... you...?

Yoshino... That's true, I don't blame you. Sure,
you can sit with me.

My, my, Shido-san... You sure seem to be easy on
Yoshino-san. I've asked around, but... do you
swing that way?

No. Absolutely not! Yoshino, unlike you guys, is a
good girl! She doesn't cause me any trouble, she's
like an oasis for me!
H-He called me good girl. Hehe...
Yoshino～ What happened to your mature girl\ncharms?
O-Oh... but...

Heh. Darling is only nice to children, right? I
mean you did say you like "big" ones...
No, no, no! I never said such a thing!

Whaaat? But you're always looking at this area
with those lustful eyes, aren't you? Darling...
you don't have to hide it!
You've got the wrong idea!
...Hehe.
Hm? What's the matter, Yoshino?

Oh, nothing... I just thought... this is what your
everyday at school must be like...

For me... Um... Unlike Tohka-san, Kaguya-san, and
Yuzuru-san, I don't get to see this side of you
all the time...

Oh, you're right... Well, it's not always
this rowdy.

I want to see your school life more, too. Are you
sure you don't want to transfer to my school,
darling?
It's an all-girls school!

You can be Shiori-san, no problem. Shiori-san will
still be my darling.

Come to think of it, I've never played with
Shiori-san before. I'd love to meet her, too...
Oh, nooo! Yoshino, there are two fan-service\nroles at play here! You have no choice but\nto counter from a teacher's standpoint!
Wh-What's that...?

Ugh... The more the merrier, I guess... More like
pure chaos.
And it's only three of them right—
Shido! It's lunch time! Let's eat!

Shido, I do not recommend that you eat with Tohka
Yatogami.

Hmph. Origami Tobiichi, you... You're in my way
yet again...!

Hehe... You seem to be livelier than usual.
However, Shido Itsuka belongs to me. I—

Suggestion. Miku and Yoshino, you are new to this
school, so why don't you take a tour? Meanwhile,
Yuzuru and Kaguya will take care of Shido.

They're all coming! I can't even get a break
during my break!
Shido! Where's my lunch?

It's in my bag! Sorry, I... uh... need to use the
bathroom!

I-I really can't get away if they're all at school
like this... I never thought it'd be this crazy...

Maybe I can go to a farther bathroom. I need
as much time alone as I can...
Shido Itsuka, you don't like this situation?

Whoa, Arusu! No, well... it's different than what
I'm used to. I wish it'd be more peaceful...

I thought this would make it easier to observe
love, but does this mean... Shido Itsuka doesn't
appreciate this moment?

Oh... well, it's not that exactly, but... I can't
lie. It's all chaos, just one thing after the
other. I'm getting really tired...

So everyone should... get along? Would it be
better if everyone were friends?
Well... I guess you could say that.
Understood. I will search for such situations.

Onii-chan, you're late! Everyone's moved on and
they're waiting for you!
Huh? Moved on?
Don't worry about it. Come this way!
...The cafeteria?
Yeah. We all decided to eat lunch with you!

You all... All of you guys are there...? Hmm...
that seems like it would be pretty chaotic.

(Is this because Arusu and I talked about them
getting along?)

Shido! This way, sit next to me! Let's enjoy our
lunch together.

I need to check whether there's poison in your
food. I will taste-test all of it. That would be
best to ensure your safety.
O-Oh... Just as I thought, nothing's changed...
Come on, Yoshino! Let's set that plan we thought\nof earlier into motion! When are you doing it?\nNow, right?!
B-But, I'm embarrassed...
Gosh! You're a teacher today, so you need to feed\nhim with an 'Ahh' like the good adult you are!
*Whimper*... I'm so embarrassed.

OHH! I want to try that too, Shido!
Come, try this.

My, what a great idea. But it may not be enough
stimulation for Shido-san. Why don't I feed you
with my mouth?

I should be the one to do so. Then I can taste
test at the same time. Passing something from my
mouth to his will be good for digestion as well.

What am I, a baby? Jeez, everyone, can't we eat in
peace? In peace, and as friends!

Hehe... Shido needs a guard, doesn't he? Us Yamai
sisters would be perfect for the role. We'll be
his vigilant wings and protect him from danger.
This isn't about bodyguarding. This is lunch!

Attention. I am unsatisfied with how far I am from
Shido. Tohka and Master Origami are always with
him, so it is fair that they move away from him.

N-No way! Food tastes so much better when I eat
near Shido!

Accusation. So are you suggesting that it's okay
if no one else is able to enjoy their meal?
Well... that's not true, but...

Hehe... If we are the ones to carry the offering
to his mouth, then I'm sure it will be heavenly...

I concur. I obtained this after an intense battle
at the snack stand. Both Yuzuru and Kaguya will
feed this to you, Shido. Now, Shido—
Hi, darling! Open wiiiiiide.
*Nom*... Miku?!

Perfect! See, this is our first step as loving
newlyweds.

*Grunt* How dare you cut in line ahead of us...!
I can pay you back for the Tenou Festival now...!
Ahhhh! Darling. Kaguya-san is sooo scary!

Hehehe. Are you scared? Save your fear for the
power of the Yamai Sisters...!

"Disagree. She's pressing her "goods" against
Shido, appealing to the male psyche. Kaguya,
you cannot compete with that trick."

Wh-What, that's totally not fair! You don't have
to say that, Yuzuru!

Everyone, stop arguing! Hehe, one of you guys can
get on my lap, too. How about you, Yoshino?
Yoshino is an adult today! So she won't be doing\nsuch a childish thing! Right, Yoshino?

Y-Yes... I-I'm a teacher... So I'm going to feed
Shido-san.
Aww, how unfortunate. How about you, Kotori-chan?

It does seem to be a full house, so maybe I'll sit
on my brother's lap. Don't you want your beloved
sister to feed you, dear Onii-chan?

Th-That's not fair, Kotori! I want to do that,
too!
You guys, cut it out!

It's nice to have a meal with everyone... But it
has to actually be fun!

...I tried to gather everyone in a friendly
setting. Was that not good enough? Dining
together should be a friendly interaction.

I knew it... It's supposed to be friendly, but at
this rate, the location just changed and
nothing's improved.

I can't even eat my own food in peace, much less a
bite from everyone else's.

...I see. There is an upper limit of food you can
physically consume.

Then... During dinner, everyone can prepare one
dish, and Shido can choose what to eat...
That way, the situation can be settled, correct?
If we do that, will I be able to feed Shido?

Yes. The dish that Shido Itsuka chooses can be fed
to him by the winner.

I see! Then leave it to me. I'm going to make
something delicious and feed Shido!

Hehe... Foolish. The Yamai Sisters have survived
many battles, among them cooking, of course.

Affirmative. And this time we will be cooperating
with each other. I can say that victory is ours.
Aww... A battle... I can't cook at all...
It's totally fine, you can do it! I mean, clearly\neveryone here will be garbage! Yoshino, you can\nwin it! I believe in you!

Cooking can change in various ways depending on
how much time you spend on the ingredients. So it
makes sense that I would win.
I will do anything for you, darling!

I see... Then why don't we eat in peace now and do
this battle thing at night?

Phew... it seems like I can finally eat. Thank
you, Arusu.

You seemed to be troubled, Shido Itsuka. My data
shows that making choices is important to growing
love.

Or what Kotori would say is typical of gal games,
huh...

The fact that this is being called a battle
worries me... I'm hoping it won't end badly.
All right, it's time to eat! I'm digging in!
Phew. Class is finally over.
(I need to go shopping for the food battle.)

Oh, Arusu. You're going with us to the market,
right?

...School is now over. Again... show me your
selection. The potential to which it may lead...

Arusu...? Don't tell me something like yesterday
is about to happen—
